channel.title: Error with client on website
channel.description:
i got this error when ive put my jar on a website and tryd to run it
[CODE]java.lang.ClassFormatError: Incompatible magic value 1013478509 in class file sign/signlink at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) at client.getParameter(client.java:9197) at client.init(client.java:287) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/CODE] java loads and i get a message that i need to accept and when the client needs to load everything i get this error[br][size=1]Posted at: October 16, 2006, 08:32:05 AM[/size][hr]gsus 40 vieuws and no one that can help me ???

item.title: Error with client on website
item.dc:creator: @mhmdk mhmdk
item.description:
@mhmdk wrote:

yes but since i got only 1 world i need to remove some parts and wtf is that cabbase ??? i still havent found out

Read full topic

item.title: Error with client on website
item.dc:creator: @Ace Ace
item.description:
@Ace wrote:

You need to pass the parameters (worldid, modewhat, modewhere etc…) to the client

For example (<3 JaGeX):

[code]

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Error with client on website
item.dc:creator: @mhmdk mhmdk
item.description:
@mhmdk wrote:

yeah but i didn’t include the signlink thats why i got that error but now i got that second error and i still don’t know whats wrong

item.title: Error with client on website
item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

Its not as signlink.class file from another client is it. I’ve tried copying another client file into a client before and it came up with the same response

item.title: Error with client on website
item.dc:creator: @mhmdk mhmdk
item.description:
@mhmdk wrote:

ROFL i already solved that i didn’t include the signlink(yes i know it was stupid :P)

now i got this error

java.lang.NumberFormatException: null at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at client.init(client.java:287) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
i know it is in the client.java on line 287 but i can’t see whats wrong

Read full topic

item.title: Error with client on website
item.dc:creator: @Asm Asm
item.description:
@Asm wrote:

ROFL!!! OMG
‘1013478509’ is ‘<htm’
Do you understand now? You’ve put HTML files instead of java code compiled to .class LOL

Read full topic

item.title: Error with client on website
item.dc:creator: @RS_CHamp2 RS CHamp2
item.description:
@RS_CHamp2 wrote:

Yea i’m also having a problem like this, i tried to embed all files on my site, but the thing is, it wont load after a specific time of loading?!?,
Could someone give us a nooby tut? PLZZZ
Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Error with client on website
item.dc:creator: @mhmdk mhmdk
item.description:
@mhmdk wrote:

ive used one of the tuts here to sign my jar

<applet name="MarkScape" width="765" height="503" archive="http://mhmdk.freehostia.com/client/MarkScape.jar" code="client"> </applet>

this is what ive put in my html file. http://mhmdk.freehostia.com/client.html here is the link to my client you can see the error there. cuz first it says that the applet is loaded but then it sayd applet MarkScape notinited.

Read full topic
